page.title: 17Farming
page.content: This area is very much a farming area and a lot of the land is given over to the growing of crops. There are many fields of wheat and barley and also some of peas, potatoes and beans. A few fields of oilseed rape are grown too. One of the farms near where I live has five tractors (they are Fords and Massey Fergusons) and one combine harvester. Towards Fairstead and Terling especially there are a number of dairy herds and my uncle is Dairy manager at one of these farms. On the farm near my house they use a lot of chemical sprays and fertilisers and the farmer likes to burn the stubble after harvest each year. Also in our area some willow trees are grown to be used for cricket bats.
